name: #1 - Two Twin Beds
description: Spacious Private room #1 has peaceful garden views with 12 foot ceilings and two twin beds.

name: #2 - Two Twin Beds
description: Room #2 is on the second floor looking over the front garden with a private balcony and 2 exposures, 2 twin beds can be combined to a king.

name: #3 - Two Twin Beds
description: Room #3 faces a quiet gardens area has a large 2 mirrored walls 2 open exposures, two twin beds than can combine into a king

name: #4 - Two Twin Beds
description: Room #4 is on the second floor looking over the front garden with a private balcony and 2 exposures, 2 twin beds can be combined to a king.

name: #5 - King Bedroom
description: The masterbedroom is a throwback to 1980's glamor, 2 mirrored walls reflect the bay views and whatever is going on in the large room bay front second floor room! There is a large private bay front balcony, gorgeous view and a massive private red bath.

name: #6 - King Bedroom
description: The New Master Suite is a spacious and beautiful bay front second floor room with private bay front balcony and a spiral stair to a large private roof deck, gorgeous views of the bay and breathtaking sunsets.

name: #7 - King Bedroom
description: The bay front room #7,THE STUDIO ROOM, is our largest room, opens directly to the pool deck with a king bed, private kitchenette and bath great bay /sunset views.
